name: Desolate Land (BlueGulu, DutchDave)
description:
The land has fallen into darkness by evil ghosts. 

You have to light up the torches around the continent to bring light back to the turtle god of light and defend it with everything you got. Torches are the circles on the ground. Sometimes a killed ghost will leave behind a soul, picking this up will temporarily decrease the amount of ghosts spawning.

W, A, S, D to move.
E to interact with unlit torches, interact for 2 seconds to light the torch.

Mouse to aim and shoot.
